name: gptfdisk
desc:
The gptfdisk package is a set of programs for creation and 
maintenance of GUID Partition Table (GPT) disk drives. A GPT partitioned
 disk is required for drives greater than 2 TB and is a modern 
replacement for legacy PC-BIOS partitioned disk drives that use
a Master Boot Record (MBR). The main program, gdisk, has an 
inteface similar to the classic fdisk program.
